scripts.build-spotlight: find ./deploy/templates/dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -delete && export NODE_ENV=production+spotlight && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir deploy/templates/dist --no-source-maps --target browser --bundle-node-modules --detailed-report
scripts.build-local: find ./deploy/templates/dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -delete && export NODE_ENV=development+spotlight && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir deploy/templates/dist --no-source-maps --target browser --bundle-node-modules --detailed-report
scripts.build-gondel: find ./deploy/templates/dist -maxdepth 1 -type f -delete && export NODE_ENV=production+gondel && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir deploy/templates/dist --no-source-maps --target browser --bundle-node-modules --detailed-report
